title: Catalog update: Books category removed
description: Moved Book, Book and Quill and Bookshelf into the Utility category. Removed the Book category all together. Will be making an 'Enchantments' category later instead.

title: Catalog update: Armor, End and Ice prices added + updated images
description: Added prices to all the items within the Armor, End and Ice categories. Fixed incorrect images as well.

title: Catalog update: Ocean items, Tools and Weapons priced + updated images
description: Added prices to all the items within the Ocean, Tools and Weapons categories. Fixed incorrect images as well.

title: Catalog update: Nether items priced and updated images
description: Added prices to all the items within the Nether category. Fixed incorrect images as well.

title: Added an 'Update' page with latest updates and roadmap
description: Added this page to show you all that stuff is happening :)

title: Almost Complete 1.16 Items List, Search and Categories Filtering
description: Major content update adding almost all items from Minecraft 1.16 with categories and item search.
